column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I had the petite duchess filet
column2: and added the bone marrow and butter.   The bone marrow was 100% worth it
column3: and while the butter was nice
column4: it wasn't necessary.  My filet was perfectly cooked (medium rare) and in combination with the marrow tasted like butter. I debated getting the bone in filet
column5: but it just seemed like too much food
column6: which is why I opted for the smaller cut.
